title: Hell Armored Bones
summaries: Hell Armored Bones are Hardmode, post-Plantera enemies that spawn in the Dungeon after Plantera is defeated. Similar to Angry Bones, they come in multiple varieties, follow the Fighter AI, and can open doors after a few hits. They can also inflict the On Fire! debuff for 10 / 20 / 25 seconds. They are visible in darkness but do not actually emit light, except for a faint glow when immersed in water.
Hell Armored Bones are most common in Dungeon areas with <linked>Tiled Walls</linked>, as indicated by the <linked>Molten Legion Flags</linked> present within these sections.
